attributes.action: We demand the Chicott enquiry is published immediately
attributes.additional_details:
It is outragious that it has been 6 years since the conclusion of the Chilcott enquiry and yet  it has still not been published.
No reason has been offered for the further delay and we believe its publication after the election is to protect guilty parties and also not to damage the prospects of political parties and MP's who might be implicated by the report.
We demand the Chilcott report be published immediately and without further delay

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: Publish the Chilcott Enquiry before the General Election 2015

Created by: Stuart long

Closing: 30/03/2015
